name: DrakeSun
description:
This is a game sort of based off of Drake's Equation. The equation gives you an estimate of the likelihood of extraterrestrial life based on multiplying probabilities (the probability that a star has a planet, the probability that those planets develop life.)

I created this as part of a self-imposed "hackathon." I followed the rules for the previous Ludum Dare's compo, and built this thing in a total of 24 hours, over the span of 3 days. The theme is "Tiny Worlds"
